present.english: The big family eats the big meal
The hungry workers eat the hot bread

imperfect.english: I was eating the delicious fruit
The big family was eating the big meal
The hungry workers were eating the hot bread

future.english: I will eat the delicious fruit
The big family will eat the big meal
The hungry workers will eat the hot bread

aorist.english: The big family ate the big meal
The hungry workers ate the hot bread

optative.english: I should eat the delicious fruit

optative.english: The big family should eat the big meal

optative.georgian: მშიერმა მუშებმა უნდა შეჭამონ ცხელი პური

imperative.english: You all (you formal), eat the fried chicken
